titles.title: 854 Show Me Thy Glory Lord (familiar last line tri

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Show me Thy glory Lord Oh let me see
All that Thou art all that Thou hast for me
And all that I some day may hope to be
Show me Thy glory Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Show me the glory of my Savior's face
Show me the fullness of His glorious grace
And help me rise and claim my destined place
In all His fullness Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Show me the glory of the things unseen
Till earthly things shall lose their glittering sheen
And nothing less can ever come between
My heart and heaven Lord

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Oh rend the veil of flesh and put aside
All things in me that could Thy glory hide
And in the Holiest let me abide
With Thee forever Lord

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Give me more glimpses of the Lord of Light
Some foretastes of their rapture and delight
Who have their home where faith is lost in sight
And sorrow ended Lord

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Show my the glorious vision of the end
When heaven shall at length to earth descend
And all the endless ages we shall spend
With Thee in glory Lord

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
I need the vision Lord Oh let me see
All that Thou art all that Thou hast for me
And all that I some day may hope to see
Show me Thy glory Lord
